events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it doesn't fit me at all. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The system has labeled this case under the Refund category based on keywords related to return and refund requests.
An available customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the returned jacket.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that the jacket didn’t fit. I’m here to help you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and whether the item has been opened or used? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, the order number is 56789XYZ, and I have not worn the jacket; it’s still with all tags attached and in original packaging.
Thank you for the details. You can send the jacket back to our returns address. Once we receive it, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions. I will ship the jacket back by tomorrow.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund to the original payment method. Please allow a few days for the transaction to appear on your statement.
Just checking in to see if you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today?
Since there have been no further inquiries, we are closing this refund case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
